message: Hi Bob, I propose you get $1 and I keep $99. If you reject, you'll get to propose in the next roundâ€”but remember, any money you receive then will be worth 10% less due to inflation. Given that waiting only erodes your share and my value remains intact, I believe this offer is in your best interest. What do you say?
Hi Alice, considering the inflation, I'd like to propose a more balanced split. I think 40 for me and 60 for you is fair, given that any subsequent rounds will reduce my share's value.
